name: Homecoming+
description:
With Mark all the way out in the woods, the demon has finally taken over Mark's abode. But Mark has other tricks up his sleeve now. How will this story end? Will it end in tragedy? Romance? Random stuff? Find out and see. 

Scratch the romance bit though, sorry.
